description: A notification sent to indicate a system event.
irTextString object provides a description of the event.

description: This trap indicates that the current temp value has gone
above the value set in irTempThresholdHigh object.
irTempValue object indicates the current temp value.

event.Summary: Current temperature value ($v2) exceeded high threshold ($v3)

description: This trap indicates that a user attempted to login and failed.
irCharPortIndex indicates the physical or tcp port.
irUserName indicates the user name.
irIpAddress indicates the ip address of the remote machine
from which the user attempted the login. If the IP address values is
non-zero, it indicates a network connection and irCharPortIndex
indicates the tcp port. If the IP address is zero, it indicates
login attemp was local and irCharPortIndex indicates the physical
port.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irLoginFailed MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irUserName s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irIpAddress s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irCharPortIndex i 9999

description: A text string used for a user name.
variables.name: MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irUserName

description: A text string used for an ip address.
variables.name: MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irIpAddress

variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irCharPortIndex

event.Summary: HDAM analog $v4 low threshold alarm cleared

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irHdamAnalogLowAlarmCleared MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogPortIndex i 1 MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogSlotIndex i 1 MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogPointIndex i 1 MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogName s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogDescription s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogCalValue s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogThresholdSeverity i 1 MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogThresholdLowAlarmCount c 9999

description: The port index on which the analog unit is attached.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogPortIndex

description: The slot in the analog unit which identifies this module.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogSlotIndex

description: An integer which uniquely identifies an analog point on this module.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogPointIndex

description: The name assigned to the analog.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogName

description: A user configurable analog description string.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogDescription

description: The current analog sensor calibrated value.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogCalValue

description: The severity value of the analog sensor assigned to the low threshold.
This value will be sent in the threshold trap.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogThresholdSeverity

description: The number of times the analog sensor low threshold has been
crossed since the unit was started.
variables.name: MRV-IR-HDAM-MIB::irAnalogThresholdLowAlarmCount

description: This trap indicates that the LDAM alarm point generated an alarm.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irLdamAlarmRaised MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPortIndex i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPointIndex i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmName s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmDescription s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmContactState i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmTrapSeverity i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmCount c 9999

description: The alarm port index.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPortIndex

description: An integer which uniquely identifies an alarm point on this port.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPointIndex

description: The name assigned to the alarm point.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmName

description: A user configurable alarm point description string.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmDescription

description: The current state of the alarm point contacts.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmContactState

description: The trap severity assigned to this alarm point. This value will
be sent when an alarm fires and an snmp trap is generated.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmTrapSeverity

description: The number of times the alarm point has been generated since the
LX was started.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmCount

description: This trap indicates that the LDAM alarm point has been cleared.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irLdamAlarmCleared MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPortIndex i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPointIndex i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmName s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmDescription s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmContactState i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmTrapSeverity i 1 MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmCount c 9999

description: The alarm port index.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPortIndex

description: An integer which uniquely identifies an alarm point on this port.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmPointIndex

description: The name assigned to the alarm point.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmName

description: A user configurable alarm point description string.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmDescription

description: The current state of the alarm point contacts.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmContactState

description: The trap severity assigned to this alarm point. This value will
be sent when an alarm fires and an snmp trap is generated.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmTrapSeverity

description: The number of times the alarm point has been generated since the
LX was started.
variables.name: MRV-IR-CHAR-MIB::irLdAlarmCount

description: This trap indicates that an IPMI discrete sensor Deassert event
has occurred.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irIpmiDiscreteDeassertEvent MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteOffset i 0 MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteSensorName s EXAMPLE

description: The offset within the discrete sensor for which the event occurred.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteOffset

description: An Ascii string indicating the name of the IPMI discrete sensor
for which the event occurred.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteSensorName

description: This trap indicates that an IPMI discrete sensor Assert event
has occurred.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irIpmiDiscreteAssertEvent MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteOffset i 0 MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteSensorName s EXAMPLE

description: The offset within the discrete sensor for which the event occurred.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteOffset

description: An Ascii string indicating the name of the IPMI discrete sensor
for which the event occurred.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiDiscreteSensorName

description: This trap indicates that an IPMI threshold sensor event has occurred.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MRV-IR-TRAP-MIB::irIpmiThresholdEvent MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdType i 1 MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdSensorName s EXAMPLE MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdDirection i 1 MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdAssert i 1

description: The type of threshold sensor event.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdType

description: An Ascii string indicating the name of the IPMI threshold sensor
for which the event occurred.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdSensorName

description: The direction of the threshold sensor event.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdDirection

description: The assertion value of the threshold sensor event.
variables.name: MRV-IR-SYSTEM-MIB::ipmiThresholdAssert
